title: Exploring Hidden Nuclei in Nearby Galaxies
text:

Research advisor: Dr. John (Jay) Gallagher III (Visiting Astronomy Professor, Macalester College & Emeritus Professor of Astronomy, U. Wisconsin-Madison)

title: Analysis of the Optical Spectra of H2O Megamaser Emissions
text:
Analysis of the Optical Spectra of H2O Megamaser Emissions, MRGS (Fall 2020 – Spring 2022) – Researching, designing, and coding an analysis of microwave energy coming from the centers of galaxies.

Research advisors: Dr. Anca Constantin (JMU Physics and Astronomy Department), Mr. Russell Kohrs (MRGS Environmental Science), Ms. Jennifer Moyers (MRGS English)
Presented at the Shenandoah Valley Regional Science and Engineering Fair, Virginia State Science and Engineering Fair, and International Science and Engineering Fair
